ValidationRule.description: Ensures that Document is linked to either of the three objects: Engagement, Opportunity, Opportunity Outcome.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISBLANK(Opportunity__c), ISBLANK(Opportunity_Outcome__c), ISBLANK(Engagement__c), ISBLANK(IP_Management__c), ISBLANK(Stewardship__c), ISBLANK(Designation__c), ISBLANK(Donation__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure Document is linked to either of these objects: Engagement, Opportunity, Opportunity Outcome, IP Management, Stewardship, Designation, Donation.
